text: The municipality is located in Krapina-Zagorje County in northern Croatia Petrovsko is a village and municipality in Krapina-Zagorje County in Croatia. According to the 2011 census, there were 2,656 inhabitants in the area, with Croats being the majority. ==References== Category:Populated places in Krapina-Zagorje County Category:Municipalities of Croatia
title: Petrovsko
